page.title: 13Trade Shopping Victoria
page.content: {Victoria}I like shopping.We go into Woolworths.It is quite big.If we take Mindy she tries to come in to the shop with us.My Dad says,"Come here.You naughty dog." My Mam says,"Do you want sweets from this shop?" "Yes please." "OK.What would you like?" "Can I have a'Line Bar'?" "How much are they?" "16p" "OK" "Here!Mam!get another for Deborah." "All right." "Come on,Dad will be waiting." When we came out my Mam says"We need to go to get Mindy some chewsticks.OK" "What?" "I said we need to go and get Mindy some chewsticks.Did you hear?" "Yes"
